0.annotation: Set default keyframe tangent to the step mode.

1.annotation: Set default keyframe tangent to the spline mode.

2.annotation: Set default keyframe tangent to the linear mode.

3.annotation: Convert selected animation curve to the cycle mode.

4.annotation: Convert selected animation curve to the cycle with offset mode.

5.annotation: Convert selected animation curve to the linear mode.

6.annotation: Convert selected animation curve to the constant mode.

7.annotation: Set easy in and easy out.
